page.title: 08Eccles Recreation Ground
page.content:
The recreation ground is one of the few open spaces in the centre of Eccles. It stands on what used to be the old Cricket Ground. It is used by a lot of people today, both young and old.
First of all there is a playground for young children, with swings, slides and roundabouts. For people who want to play sports there are two football pitches, tennis courts and bowling greens.
The football pitches are shared between school and adult teams. This means that they are used a lot and are a bit too big for schools. The bowling greens are very popular with old folk. Quite a lot of people use the park to run in. Many people think that the biggest problem in the park is dogs.
